name: Snowie's Present Hunt
description:
====Santa Jam 2021 Submission====

Welcome to the joy of Christmas stress!

Our friend Snowie's party crew mistakenly hid all the presents because they thought she was hosting a birthday party instead. Wow, what a nightmare this has become.

Have no fear though! You have been tasked to find the presents and save her party!

Controls

Left Right Mouse Button - Interact

Mouse Motion / Screen Drag - Interact

Tools Used

Godot 3.2 - Game Engine

Reaper - Music

PixilArt - Art

Credits

metal whistle sound - from strongbot (Freesounds.org)

wind synthesized sound - inspectorj (Freesounds.org)

floor foot steps - sgrowe (Freesounds.org)

fire place ambience - aunrea (Freesounds.org)

This was a solo entry

Additional Information

Feedback is always welcome! Game design is definitely something I am working on and if the gameplay is off or there are design flaws, please let me know! 

There is a bug with Godot HTML exports where the sound crackles and I do apologize for the inconvenience. If requested, I can provide .exe files for windows and mac.

For a better experience, Microsoft Edge or Firefox may run the game a bit better but mileage may vary!

I hope you can save Snowie's Christmas!! Enjoy!
